Riddings Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
riddings-contest

A Souvenir of the Opera
Riddings Park, Riddings, Derbyshire
Prizes - 1st £10 and cup, 2nd £7, 3rd £4, 4th £2. March contest (own choice) - 1st(£1) Ripley United, 2nd(10s.) Stanton Ironworks. Promoted by Riddings United Prize Band. 7 bands competed.
